function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 virus","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and spread within indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Enhancing ventilation rates, eliminating air-recirculation, using portable air cleaners with mechanical filtration systems, and avoiding overcrowding","Technologies":"Enhanced ventilation systems, portable air cleaners with mechanical filtration systems","People":"Building managers, hospital administrators, infection control teams, students, restaurant owners, public transport authorities","Owner":"Building managers, hospital administrators, infection control teams, school administrators, restaurant owners, public transport authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of engineering controls in reducing airborne infection risks","Impact":"Continued spread of SARS-CoV-2 and other airborne infections within indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Reminder and highlighting of the effectiveness of engineering controls, increased ventilation rates, and elimination of air-recirculation","Technologies":"Enhanced ventilation systems, elimination of air-recirculation","People":"Building managers, hospital administrators, infection control teams","Owner":"Building managers, hospital administrators, infection control teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate maintenance of air cleaners leading to reduced filtration efficiency","Impact":"Risk of airborne microdroplets not being effectively captured, leading to increased transmission risk","Mitigation":"Regular replacement of air cleaner filters and proper maintenance","Technologies":"Regular replacement of air cleaner filters, maintenance protocols for air cleaners","People":"Building managers, hospital administrators, infection control teams","Owner":"Building managers, hospital administrators, infection control teams"}]}
